Uses of Package
org.xflatdb.xflat.db

  • Packages that use org.xflatdb.xflat.db 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat
    This package contains the public interface for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.db
    This package contains the core classes for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.engine
    This package contains the implementations of Engine that are provided by XFlat out of the box.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction
    This package contains all the classes related to the public transaction API, as well as the main TransactionManager implementations.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.db used by org.xflatdb.xflat 
    Class and Description
    EngineState
    Represents the progression of states in an engine as it is used.
    IdGenerator
    The base class for an ID generator.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.db used by org.xflatdb.xflat.db 
    Class and Description
    Engine
    The base interface for an XFlat table engine.
    EngineAction
    Represents an action that a table can perform with an engine.
    EngineBase
    The base class for Engine objects.
    EngineBase.RowData 
    EngineBase.SpinDownEvent
    An event object given to the EngineBase.SpinDownEventHandler when an engine finishes spinning down.
    EngineBase.SpinDownEventHandler
    An event handler for the events fired when an Engine finishes spinning down.
    EngineFactory
    An EngineFactory chooses which Engine to instantiate based on the given File.
    EngineState
    Represents the progression of states in an engine as it is used.
    EngineTransactionManager
    The Base Class of all Transaction Managers.

    This class defines the contract required of Transaction Manager implementations by XFlat.
    IdAccessor
    A helper class that accesses the IDs of an object.
    IdGenerator
    The base class for an ID generator.
    TableBase
    The base class for implementations of Table.
    TableMetadata
    A class containing metadata about a Table, and providing the ability to spin up engines for that table.
    TableMetadataFactory
    A Factory which creates TableMetadata instances.
    XFlatDatabase
    The base class for classes that manage tables and conversion services.
    XFlatDatabase.DatabaseState
    Represents the various states of the Database.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.db used by org.xflatdb.xflat.engine 
    Class and Description
    Engine
    The base interface for an XFlat table engine.
    EngineBase
    The base class for Engine objects.
    EngineBase.SpinDownEventHandler
    An event handler for the events fired when an Engine finishes spinning down.
    EngineFactory
    An EngineFactory chooses which Engine to instantiate based on the given File.
    ShardedEngineBase
    The base class for all engines that are sharded.
  • Classes in org.xflatdb.xflat.db used by org.xflatdb.xflat.transaction 
    Class and Description
    EngineBase
    The base class for Engine objects.
    EngineTransactionManager
    The Base Class of all Transaction Managers.

    This class defines the contract required of Transaction Manager implementations by XFlat.
    XFlatDatabase
    The base class for classes that manage tables and conversion services.
